title: Engineering Manager
summary: DataInsight Solutions is seeking an experienced Engineering Manager to lead our software development team in Calgary. The successful candidate will have a strong background in software engineering and DevOps, with expertise in Docker, Python, and Java. You will be responsible for overseeing the development and deployment of robust software solutions, ensuring high-quality deliverables, and fostering a culture of innovation and collaboration.
responsibilities: Lead and manage a team of software engineers, providing guidance and mentorship to ensure successful project delivery.
Oversee the design, development, and deployment of scalable applications using Docker, Python, and Java.
Implement and improve DevOps practices to streamline software development and deployment processes.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Ensure code quality and maintainability through code reviews and best practices.
Coordinate with stakeholders to gather and prioritize requirements, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
Drive the implementation of CI/CD pipelines to enhance application reliability and performance.
Facilitate technical discussions and problem-solving sessions to address complex engineering challenges.
Manage project timelines, deliverables, and resource allocation to meet company goals.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience as an Engineering Manager or in a similar leadership role.
Expertise in DevOps practices and tools, including Docker and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD).
Proficiency in Python and intermediate knowledge of Java.
Strong experience with version control systems, particularly Git.
Solid understanding of software development principles and methodologies.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with a knack for problem-solving.
Experience with Node.js and JavaScript is an asset.
Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
